Name: Doughnut Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: My attempt at mimicking the taste of a Krispy Kreme Original Glazed doughnut without ending up with an overly sweet cocktail.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Doughnut Cocktail contains 260 calories
